scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a chaotic urban street where soldiers are violently attacking women and children. In the foreground, a woman in a red dress, holding a baby, is being pulled by a soldier in blue armor. Another soldier in the background is engaged in combat with a sword. Several dead infants and severed heads are scattered on the ground, emphasizing the brutality of the event. Behind the figures, a cityscape with various buildings, including houses with tiled roofs and tall towers, is visible under a blue sky. The overall impression is one of extreme violence and tragedy.
